A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

remarks.note: With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

unsupported security scheme

This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

note.para: The application should maintain the stream resources being valid until the PDF document close.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.Uwp.PdfViewer.CloseDocument
member.summary: Close and dispose of a loaded PDF document.

remarks.para: This method sets the property to null, but does not dispose of the document if it was loaded manualy instead of using the method.
If you created an instance of the class and manualy assign it to the property, then you should dispose of the document yourself after checking that the document can be disposed.

A string used as the password for PDF file. If no password needed, empty or NULL can be used.
member.exception: unknown error
file not found or could not be opened
file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

remarks.note: With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.IViewerMethods.LoadDocument(System.IO.Stream,System.String)

file not in PDF format or corrupted
password required or incorrect password
unsupported security scheme
Error occured in PDFium. See ErrorCode for detail
This exception thrown only in trial mode if document cannot be opened due to a license restrictions"

note.para: The application should maintain the stream resources being valid until the PDF document close.

With the trial version the documents which size is smaller than 1024 Kb, or greater than 10 Mb can be loaded without any restrictions. For other documents the allowed ranges is 1.5 - 2 Mb; 2.5 - 3 Mb; 3.5 - 4 Mb; 4.5 - 5 Mb and so on.

member.name: M:Patagames.Pdf.Net.Controls.IViewerMethods.CloseDocument
member.summary: Close and dispose of a loaded PDF document.

remarks.para: This method sets the property to null, but does not dispose of the document if it was loaded manualy instead of using the method.
If you created an instance of the class and manualy assign it to the property, then you should dispose of the document yourself after checking that the document can be disposed.
